ygData.subject: Re: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: Most people are rather willing to do it if you can teach them another language as well.  On my Ranger, I know Common, Elven, Theives Cant, Gnomish, Elder
ygData.messageBody:
Most people are rather willing to do it if you can teach them another
language as well. On my Ranger, I know Common, Elven, Theives' Cant,
Gnomish, Elder Elven, and Dwarf to a good level.

Pyrdian

-----Original Message-----
From: Doug Babcock [mailto:dbabcock@...]
Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 10:10 AM
To: _EQ_Magic@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [_EQ_Magic] Languages


From: Douglas Babcock <dbabcock@...>

Yes
Group with someone that has the language you want. Have them SPAM you using
that language.
Watch your skill increase rapidly
